color: Color (American English) or colour (Commonwealth English) is the visual perceptual property corresponding in humans to the categories called red, blue, yellow, etc. Here is an interesting link on the subject: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Color
javascript: JavaScript is a high-level, dynamic, untyped, and interpreted programming language. Here is an interesting link on the subject: https://www.javascript.com/
sun: The Sun (in Greek: Helios, in Latin: Sol) is the star at the center of the Solar System and is by far the most important source of energy for life on Earth. Here is an interesting link on the subject: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sun
